title: XP-Pen Artist 10 Review
description:
Check out http://www.squarespace.com for a free trial or go to  http://www.squarespace.com/bradcolbow to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.

The XP-Pen astist 10 is the smallest and cheapest screen based drawing tablet you can buy at $170. But  even at that great price is it worth it or does it cut to many corners?
